title: Senior UX Designer (F/M/X)
description:
Job description
  
  

Join our team and start a new adventure in an international and dynamic environment, where you will be able to fulfill your career expectations in a fast-growing organization. You’ll have the opportunity to work within our design team, shaping user journeys and driving innovation across digital products. This role is pivotal in ensuring our solutions are user-centric, intuitive, and exceed expectations.
  
  

Your missions
  
Execute a range of UX activities across our platforms, ensuring the delivery of valuable, desirable, and intuitive solutions.
  
Visualize concepts and translate abstract ideas into tangible and impactful designs.
  
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to reimagine and improve user interfaces, enhancing the overall user experience.
  
Manage stakeholders, understand their requirements, and align design solutions with business goals.
  
Communicate effectively with diverse teams, facilitating collaboration and ensuring a well-defined design process.
  
Contribute to the development and implementation of design best practices and methodologies.
  
Oversee the end-to-end design process, from ideation to implementation, ensuring the highest quality in design execution.
  
Ensure compliance with best practice standards (UX, brand, design system, relevant legal and accessibility standards) and secure optimal implementation.
  
Mentor, provide constructive feedback, and guide the development of other designers.
  
Actively participate in the larger UX Chapter, contributing to knowledge sharing initiatives and engaging in collaborative activities.
  
Your profile
  
**Academic background:** Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Human-Computer Interaction, Interaction Design, User Experience, or a related discipline.
  
Experience in UX design (minimum 7 years).
  
Strong experience in automotive or equivalent field
  
**Proficiency with design tools:** Sketch, Figma, Adobe Creative Suite.
  
Strong portfolio showcasing a variety of successful design projects across different platforms and devices.
  
Demonstrated experience in leading and managing UX projects from concept to delivery.
  
Ability to present and articulate design decisions to both designers and non-designers.
  
You demonstrate strong stakeholder management skills.
  
You demonstrate strong communication skills.
  
You demonstrate strong mentoring and leadership abilities.
  
English fluency is required; Swedish proficiency is highly meritorious.
  
What we offer
  
An international community bringing together 110+ different nationalities
  
**An environment where trust has a central place:** 70% of our key leaders started their careers at the first level of responsibilities
  
A robust training system with our internal Academy and 250+ available modules
  
Sustainability is part of everything we do. You’ll have the opportunity to turn your ideas into action and make a tangible impact. Every day, our teams bring our ESG commitments to life, from reducing our footprint to driving positive change within our communities. Through our WeCare Together program, you’ll be empowered to design and lead projects that create real social or environmental impact, with the company’s full support.
  
  

We are proud to be an equal-opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.
  
  

Who are we?
  
Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.
  
  

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:
  
  

**Brief Call:** Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!
  
  

Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
  
  

**Case study:** Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.
  
  

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
  
We look forward to meeting you!
company_description: Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. It gathers more than 7,500 people across 5 continents and more than 60 countries.

title: Junior Digital Marknadsförare / Content & SEO (heltid)
description:
Vill du vara med och bygga synlighet, förtroende och affärer i ett bolag som arbetar med verkliga problem – inte fluff?
  
Specialrengöringar Sverige och Klotterkonsulten AKS är en nationell kedja med stora ambitioner. Vi har kommit en bra bit på vägen, men ska betydligt längre – och det kan inte gå fort nog.
  
Idag är vi cirka 100 medarbetare runt om i Sverige som varje dag arbetar för att skapa rena, fräscha och hälsosamma miljöer där människor trivs och mår bra. Vår ambition är att bli Skandinaviens mest professionella specialrengöringsföretag, och för att ta nästa steg behöver vi förstärka vårt team.
  
Vi är ett familjärt företag med lokalkontor på 18 platser i landet.
  
Nu söker vi en junior digital marknadsförare som vill växa tillsammans med oss och arbeta nära både verksamheten och vår befintliga kommunikatör Dennis, som framöver kommer arbeta cirka 20 % i samband med vidareutbildning.
  
Det här är inte en byråroll.
  
Det är en verksamhetsnära roll där du får förstå hur affärer skapas, hur kunder tänker – och hur digital synlighet faktiskt leder till jobb ute i landet.
  
Du utgår från vårt kontor i Järfälla och blir en naturlig del av vardagen tillsammans med tekniker, sälj, support och ledning.
  
Vad du kommer att arbeta med
  
Du kommer inte kunna allt från början – men du måste vilja lära dig.
  
Huvudfokus
  
Skapa och optimera innehåll för våra webbplatser (SEO, struktur, texter)
  
Arbeta med synlighet i sökmotorer – både idag och inför framtidens AI-baserade sök
  
Producera innehåll för sociala medier (bild, text och enklare video)
  
Medverka i nyhetsbrev, produktblad och kampanjer
  
Förstå vilka frågor våra kunder faktiskt söker svar på – och hjälpa oss besvara dem på ett tydligt och förtroendeingivande sätt
  
  

Tillsammans med Dennis kommer du att
  
Vidareutveckla webb och innehåll
  
Skapa en enhetlig tonalitet och struktur i vårt material
  
Testa nya format, kanaler och arbetssätt
  
  

Vem vi tror att du är
  
Du är nyfiken, kreativ och självgående
  
Du gillar struktur men är inte rädd för att testa nytt
  
Du skriver och pratar svenska helt obehindrat
  
Du vill förstå varför saker görs – inte bara hur
  
  

Grundläggande kunskap (eller stark vilja att lära)
  
Digital marknadsföring
  
Copywriting
  
WordPress
  
Enklare design i exempelvis Canva, Photoshop eller liknande
  
Grundläggande videoredigering
  
Intresse för SEO
  
  

Meriterande (men inget krav)
  
Fördjupad SEO-kunskap (on-page, off-page)
  
Erfarenhet av AI-verktyg kopplat till sök och content
  
Förståelse för UI/UX
  
  

Vi erbjuder
  
En utvecklande roll med stort eget ansvar
  
Möjlighet att växa i takt med bolaget
  
Närhet till beslutsfattande och korta ledtider
  
  

**Lön i spannet:**  

**Junior:** cirka 27 000 kr
  
**Mer erfaren:** upp till 35 000 kr
  
  

Arbetet utförs huvudsakligen från vårt kontor i Järfälla, Stockholm.
  
Vi är idag en mansdominerad arbetsplats och välkomnar särskilt kvinnliga sökande.
  
Vi undanber oss vänligen kontakt från rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag – vi sköter rekryteringen själva.

title: Data Quality Intern (LIA) – Tracking & Analytics
description:
Location: Stockholm


Start date: spring 2026

### **About Conversionista**


Conversionista is Scandinavia's largest team of conversion optimization specialists. We use data-driven insights and scientific methods to help renowned companies enhance their digital platforms and enable businesses to flourish. Our teams are dedicated to improving user experiences and achieving business growth through actionable insights.

### **Internship overview**


We are excited to offer this internship position in our Stockholm office. We are looking for an enthusiastic, talented, and motivated intern who wants to learn and progress in data quality area:


Data Quality / Tracking Implementation / Measurement


As an intern at Conversionista, you will collaborate with our expert consultants and work directly with established, well-known companies. This hands-on experience will allow you to apply your theoretical knowledge to real-world challenges, bridging the gap between academia and industry.

### **What we aim for you to do**


Work with implementation and configuration of tracking solutions using Google Tag Manager (GTM)


Implement and validate marketing pixels and third‑party tools (e.g. ad platforms, analytics and marketing tools)


Support setup and management of consent solutions and compliant data collection


Work with GA4 to validate, troubleshoot, and quality‑assure data


Assist with documentation and quality checks to ensure reliable and consistent data across platforms


Collaborate with analysts, CRO specialists, and UX designers to enable accurate measurement for experiments and insights

### **What we offer**


A learning-centric environment where you will grow as an measurement specialist.


Exposure to exciting brands and impactful projects.


A supportive and caring organizational culture, with helpful colleagues across our various teams and competencies (CRO, UX, User Research, Analytics, **Data Quality**, Advisory).


A dedicated mentor to guide you throughout your internship and provide skill development coaching.


An opportunity to learn about and contribute to data-driven design and CRO practices.

### **Who you are**


Currently studying or recently graduated from a relevant university or vocational education program such as Digital Analytics, Business Analytics, or Data Science.


Passionate about topics like data analysis, digital optimization, and tracking implementation.


Has some experience with web analytics tools such as Google Analytics 4 and Google Tag Manager.


Eager to learn and apply data-driven approaches in identifying and solving customer pain points that will eventually impact the business.


Excellent communication skills and a professional demeanor.

### **Application process**


To apply, please submit your resume along with a cover letter via this portal, explaining why you are applying to Conversionista, what you are most interested in, and how your skills align with those interests.


This position is based in our Stockholm office. While we offer the flexibility of working remotely, we encourage working mostly on-site to ensure you get the most out of your internship!


Note that we can’t process any applications through email or LinkedIn. All applications must be submitted through this portal.

title: Digital Content Manager till expansivt bolag!
description:
Vår kund söker nu en Digital Content Manager som tar ett helhetsansvar för kundens digitala närvaro. I rollen säkerställer du att marknadsföringen inte bara når ut, utan också bygger förtroende, tydlighet och ett starkt varumärke över tid.


Du kombinerar operativ produktion med ett strategiskt perspektiv på hur kunder upplever och interagerar med bolaget digitalt – från första kontakt till beslut.

#### **Ditt uppdrag**

* **Utveckla den digitala identiteten**  

Säkerställa en tydlig, konsekvent och professionell profil i alla digitala kanaler.
* **Strategisk innehållsproduktion**  

Skapa artiklar och annat redaktionellt innehåll som förklarar värde, stärker varumärket och stödjer kundens beslutsprocess.
* **Optimera kundresan**  

Analysera hur innehållet används och tas emot, och justera struktur, budskap och UX-writing för att förbättra användarupplevelse och konvertering.
* **Kanalansvar**  

Driva och utveckla innehåll för webb, nyhetsbrev och sociala medier med fokus på affärsnytta, kvalitet och användarvänlighet.

#### **Vi tror att du**

* Har 3–5 års erfarenhet av digital marknadsföring med ansvar för innehåll.
* Har en god förståelse för hur man bygger och förvaltar en digital identitet över tid.
* Har arbetat med kundresor och förstår hur UX-writing och innehåll påverkar förtroende och konvertering.
* Trivs med ansvar, arbetar självständigt och är van att samarbeta nära ledning i ett bolag i tillväxt.

#### **Vad erbjuds**


Du erbjuds en nyckelroll i ett stabilt men expansivt bolag i Stockholm. Här får du stort förtroende att forma både rollen och bolagets digitala närvaro från dag ett. Kulturen är prestigelös, tempot högt och beslutsvägarna korta.


Detta är en direktrekrytering som hanteras av Liminity AB. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande.

title: Senior Product Design Lead
description:
At Anyfin, we believe finance should work in favor of the consumer – not the other way around. That’s why we build smart, transparent and customer-first solutions that make everyday finances easier and fairer.


But we aim higher: more customers, products, markets… all of which need a well-designed, flawless experience. That’s why we’re currently looking for a **Senior Product Design Lead** to join us and elevate our product experience across the board.

**What you will be doing**
--------------------------


As a Senior Product Design Lead at Anyfin, you will drive the vision, quality, and execution of the design experience across multiple product areas. You connect design quality to strategy and measurable business results.


You will lead the Product Design team while working hands-on the majority of your time. When we say lead, we mean *by example*: you maintain a high bar for visual and interaction design and bring clarity to complex problem spaces. You’re a true player/coach — someone who can zoom into the finer details of the craft while coaching others to raise our collective output.


Collaboration is central to the role. You don’t just work closely with Product, Engineering, and Marketing—you define and evolve the ways of working across discovery, delivery, and validation, ensuring what we ship is beautiful, intuitive, strategically aligned, and measurably impactful. You will guide teams through discovery, delivery, and validation and help break down complex financial concepts into clear, elegant, user-friendly experiences.


Your work will have a direct impact on how customers interact with their finances, and your contributions will play a big part in our mission of making financial well-being happen.

**Who you are**
---------------


We’re looking for someone who thrives at the intersection of leadership, craft, and strategic thinking — someone who elevates the team while pushing the quality of the product experience forward. Here’s what we’re looking for:

* You have deep experience leading product design in fast-paced environments and are comfortable guiding multiple product areas at once. Fintech or financial services experience is a bonus.
* You bring a deep understanding of UX design patterns and usability principles, and you set a consistently high visual and interaction bar.
* You excel at translating complex problems into simple, elegant, user-centric solutions.
* You have strong native mobile design expertise, from navigation patterns to platform conventions.
* You lead cross‑functional collaboration with Product, Engineering, and Marketing, aligning stakeholders and decisions across multiple product areas.
* You’re comfortable defining and running product discovery and validation activities and tying design decisions directly to business goals and measurable outcomes.
* You design within regulatory and compliance constraints (e.g., KYC/AML, disclosures) without sacrificing clarity or user experience.
* You’re comfortable defining and running product discovery and validation activities, and you consistently link design decisions to business goals and measurable outcomes.
* You have experience designing within regulatory or compliance constraints without sacrificing user experience.
* You have experience owning or scaling design systems — ensuring accessibility, consistency, and efficiency across teams.

**What we offer**
-----------------


We offer you the chance to be part of something truly meaningful. You’ll work alongside colleagues in Product, Engineering, Marketing, Credit, Operations and more — giving you a broad playground to influence and shape. We promise you’ll be challenged, supported, and given work that truly matters.


Beyond the mission, we offer a competitive compensation package, a centrally located and cozy office, extra time off on your birthday, and plenty of other benefits along the way.


If you’re ready to help build the future of user-centric financial products, click “Apply” below.
  

  

We can’t wait to meet you!
company_description: We're the rebels of the financial industry, putting an end to overpriced financial products. We push the envelope of fintech and financial health!

title: Software Engineer - Merchant Onboarding
description:
##### **What we do at Qliro**


At Qliro, we deliver safe and simple payments. We are a dedicated partner to our merchants who serve their customers every day. We believe that if our merchants grow, we grow. We are a company of dedicated, friendly, and highly competent people who together have redefined what Qliro and payments can be. We are now on a journey of scaling our business both in Sweden and the Nordics.

##### **What your team does**


The Merchant Onboarding team is building the future of how merchants get started with our checkout solution. We’re creating a self-service onboarding tool that lets merchants and agents configure payment options automatically through a user-friendly, intuitive UI. Our goal is to remove friction and make integration fast and simple, enabling Qliro to grow to new heights!


We work in a modern, cloud-based environment with a strong focus on product thinking, developer experience, and great UX. You’ll be joining a collaborative, international team who learn and have fun together.

**Current focus for the team:**


Building a self-service onboarding platform for merchants and agents with C#/.NET and React


Creating intuitive, scalable UIs for payment configuration and checkout setup


Being one of the key factors for making Qliro grow with new merchants every day


Close collaboration between developers, product, and design


A dedicated day every other week to be creative, try out ideas and learn something new

**Tech stack highlights:**


C#, .NET (10), React, TypeScript, Tailwind, REST APIs, AWS, Terraform, Git, CI/CD, PostgreSQL, MongoDB

**What we are looking for in our new team member:**


Fullstack mindset – You’re comfortable working across backend and frontend, and enjoy owning features end-to-end


Agile & quality-focused – You have hands-on experience with agile development and solid understanding of software engineering practices


Testing & reliability – You value automated testing and building maintainable and scalable systems


Team player - Strong communicator and team player who wants to drive initiatives and collaborate with others both in and outside of the team.

**Extra plus if:**


‍ Interest in design & UX – You care about how things look and feel, and enjoy building intuitive, merchant-friendly interfaces


️ Cloud-curious – Experience with AWS, Infrastructure-as-Code, or cloud platforms is a big plus


Payments or fintech experience – Nice to have, but not required

##### **Does this sound like your next role? What are you waiting for – apply now!**

 *Qliro is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will be considered for employment without regard to gender, gender identity or expression, national origin, religion or other beliefs, disability, sexual* orientation *or age*.

title: UX Research Operations Specialist
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Flerårig erfarenhet av UX research, gärna med fokus på ResearchOps
* Mycket god kunskap om verktyg och processer för att samla, dokumentera och dela data och insikter
* Erfarenhet av att införa och driva researchprocesser i större organisationer
* God förståelse för hur olika researchmetoder kompletterar varandra
* Vana vid relevanta AI-verktyg för hela researchprocessen
* Utmärkt samarbets- och kommunikationsförmåga (på svenska)

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 22-01-2026 **Om Oss**  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.


Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?  

  

*Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Product Designer
description:
Anyfin is on a mission to change millions of financial lives for the better. Since our start over seven years ago, we’ve been doing this one customer at a time — with user experience and design at the core of our offering. But we aim higher; new customers, new products, and new design challenges. That’s why we are currently looking for a **Product Designer** to join our Design team.

**What you will be doing**
--------------------------


Your focus will be on creating intuitive, user-centric solutions that truly help people understand and manage their finances — every single day. This means collaborating closely with Product, Engineering, Marketing, and Customer Service teams across all our markets to ensure we’re building thoughtful, effective, and accessible product experiences.


A big part of your work will involve driving design efforts from exploration to launch and beyond. You’ll rapidly prototype, iterate, and explore multiple directions to uncover the best possible solutions. You will also contribute to and evolve our shared Design System, ensuring visual consistency and design quality across the entire product ecosystem.


We adopt a hypothesis-driven approach, grounding our work in user feedback, data, and structured thinking. At Anyfin, the products you design genuinely matter — helping people take control of their personal finances.

**Who you are**
---------------


We’re looking for someone with a strong passion for visual excellence, systems thinking, and user experience — someone who wants to stay hands-on with the craft while collaborating across teams. You inspire those around you and help raise the overall design quality across the organization. And yes, here come the bullet points (they do serve a purpose):

* A proven track record as a product designer in a fast-paced environment, ideally designing B2C products that make a real difference to users.
* Strong UI craft and a solid understanding of UX design patterns.
* A portfolio that demonstrates clear, structured thinking and a user-centered design approach.
* Experience driving design work end-to-end: exploration, prototyping, iteration, delivery, and continuous improvement.
* The ability to quickly explore multiple design directions and use feedback to guide decision-making.
* Strong communication skills — you present your ideas clearly, manage stakeholders effectively, and tie design decisions to measurable outcomes and business goals.
* Experience collaborating closely with Product, Engineering, and Marketing teams.
* Openness to feedback and a desire to grow both personally and in how design impacts teams and the broader organization.
* Bonus points if you’ve contributed to or scaled design systems across teams.

**What we offer**
-----------------


We offer you the chance to be part of something truly meaningful. You’ll work alongside colleagues who are ridiculously passionate about users and the experience we deliver to them. We promise you’ll be challenged, supported, and given the opportunity to work on things that actually matter.


Then there’s the competitive compensation package, our centrally located and cozy office, extra time off on your birthday, and a bunch of other benefits. But we’ll get to all that in due time. For now, begin your journey with us by clicking **"Apply"** below.


We cannot wait to meet you!
company_description: We're the rebels of the financial industry, putting an end to overpriced financial products. We push the envelope of fintech and financial health!

title: Junior Digital kommunikatör – UX & innehåll
description:
Vår kund är ett bolag i stark tillväxt med en tydlig digital ambition. Nu söker de en digital kommunikatör som kombinerar starkt innehåll med ett tydligt UX-fokus för att guida användaren hela vägen.


Rollen är operativ och passar dig med 1–3 års erfarenhet som vill arbeta nära affär och användare i en organisation med korta beslutsvägar. Här är förståelse för struktur, flöden och UX lika viktigt som att skriva bra texter.

**Dina uppgifter**

* Skriva webbtexter, artiklar och innehåll med fokus på tydlighet och UX-writing
* Strukturera innehåll och flöden så att användaren enkelt hittar rätt
* Säkerställa en konsekvent tonalitet och digital identitet i alla kanaler
* Skapa och vidareutveckla nyhetsbrev och kampanjutskick
* Planera och publicera innehåll i sociala medier

**Vi tror att du**

* Har 1–3 års erfarenhet som kommunikatör, skribent eller i en liknande roll
* Har ett intresse för användarupplevelse och förstår hur språk och struktur påverkar digital kommunikation
* Är en trygg skribent som kan anpassa ton och nivå efter målgrupp
* Är självgående, nyfiken och trivs i en föränderlig miljö

**Vad erbjuds?**


Du erbjuds en viktig roll i ett bolag i tillväxt i Stockholm, där du får förtroende att ta ansvar och utvecklas i takt med verksamheten. Här råder en prestigelös kultur med högt tempo och snabba beslut.

###### ***Detta är en direktrekrytering som hanteras av Liminity AB. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande.***

title: Senior Tjänstedesigner
description:
**Professional Galaxy** är ett IT- och teknikkonsultbolag som tillhandahåller högspecialiserad kompetens inom IT, mjukvaruutveckling, SAP, inköp, elektronik och mekanisk konstruktion. Vi samarbetar med erfarna seniora experter och levererar strategiskt värdeskapande kompetens till några av Sveriges mest komplexa och analytiskt krävande projekt. Vårt fokus ligger alltid på hög kvalitet, professionalism och tydliga, mätbara resultat.


Är du rätt person för uppdraget, eller vill du rekommendera en stark kandidat? Tveka inte att kontakta oss.


Ansök gärna redan idag, urval och intervjuer sker löpande.


Vi söker nu en **Senior Tjänstedesigner** hos vår kund.

**Bakgrund:**  

VGR Servicefunktion står inför ett strategiskt skifte där säker och energisnål AI ska användas för att frigöra tid för kvalitativt och värdeskapande arbete. Fokus ska ligga på ökat värdeskapande i leveransen till Servicefunktionens kunder och användare genom regelstyrda processer, kunskapsstöd och arbetsflödesautomatisering som stärker arbetsmiljö, kvalitet och tillit – utan att kompromissa med datasuveränitet, etik eller rättssäkerhet. Vilket även ligger i linje med politiskt fastställda mål om effektivitet, kvalitet, hållbarhet och tillit.


Uppdraget tar sin utgångspunkt i ett förberedande strategiskt fundament inför ett bredare AI-strategiarbete med planerad start i januari 2026. Det förberedande arbetet syftar till att skapa gemensam förståelse, riktning och arbetsform för AI inom Servicefunktionen, snarare än att leverera en färdig AI-  

strategi. Den seniora tjänstedesignerns uppdrag är en central del i detta arbete och syftar till att säkerställa ett konsekvent människocentrerat, användarnära och samskapande angreppssätt i utvecklingen av AI-relaterade förmågor och initiativ inom Servicefunktionen.


Uppdraget genomförs i nära samverkan med VGR:s interna specialister och verksamhetsrepresentanter samt relaterar till pågående initiativ inom digital arbetsmiljö (DAM), intern kunskapshantering och verksamhetsutveckling. Uppdraget har tydliga kopplingar till den bredare samhällsutvecklingen kring ansvarsfull AI i offentlig sektor, inklusive EU:s AI-förordning och nationella riktlinjer för datasuveränitet och transparens.  

Uppdragsbeskrivning:  

Uppdraget avser en (1) senior tjänstedesigner, med cirka 50 % dedikerad tid, under den inledande strategiska och förmågebyggande fasen. Uppdraget kan komma att förlängas beroende på beslut och utfall. Syftet med konsultuppdraget är att säkerställa att AI-arbetet inom VGR Servicefunktion utgår från verkliga användarbehov, tydliga värdehypoteser och organisatorisk genomförbarhet. Konsulten ska bidra till att bygga långsiktig designförmåga och skapa samsyn mellan verksamhet, teknik och strategi.

 **Konsulten ansvarar för att:**

* Genomföra användarcentrerad analys av behov, arbetsflöden och utmaningar kopplade till Servicefunktionens uppdrag
* Planera och facilitera workshops, samskapande aktiviteter och förmågekartläggning tillsammans med verksamhet och specialister
* Visualisera nuläge, målbild och beroenden genom exempelvis användarresor, service blueprints och ekosystemkartläggning
* Ta fram, testa och iterera koncept, prototyper och arbetssätt i nära dialog med användare
* Säkerställa att designprinciper för begriplighet, tillit, minskad kognitiv belastning och god arbetsmiljö genomsyrar arbetet
* Bidra till etablering av strukturer för kontinuerlig feedback, lärande och effektuppföljning
* Uppdraget innefattar även: Dokumentation och presentation av insikter och rekommendationer,


 Stöd till VGR i att utveckla ett mer kund-, användar- och effektfokuserat arbetssätt,  

* Nära samarbete med senior strateg och tvärfunktionella team.

  

**Att leverera:**  

Konsulten ska vara en trygg och erfaren tjänstedesigner med stark förmåga att bygga relationer, skapa samsyn och omsätta komplexa sammanhang till tydliga och användbara helheter. Rollen kräver ett inkluderande och pedagogiskt förhållningssätt samt vana att arbeta i föränderliga, tvärfunktionella och agila miljöer.  

  

**SKA-krav (Måste uppfyllas)**  

* Minst 8 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av tjänstedesign, UX-design eller motsvarande användarcentrerat designarbete.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av strategisk och operativ tjänstedesign i komplexa organisationer.
* Mycket god förmåga att genomföra och syntetisera användarinsikter, inklusive research, intervjuer, workshops, samskapande piloter och analys.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att mappa och visualisera användarresor, service blueprints och ekosystemkartläggning.
* Erfarenhet av att facilitera workshops och samskapande processer med verksamhet, ledning och tvärfunktionella team.
* Mycket god kommunikativ förmåga samt vana att presentera insikter, koncept och rekommendationer för beslutsfattare och större grupper.


- Erfarenhet av fördjupat analys- eller forskningsarbete kring användarupplevelse, tillit och upplevd begriplighet i AI-baserade eller automatiserade  

gränssnitt, dokumenterat genom publikation, konferenspresentation eller motsvarande.  

  

**Önskvärd kompetens: (Bör uppfyllas)**  

* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med design i AI-nära eller datadrivna tjänster och system.
* Erfarenhet av att bidra till designmognad och förflyttning av arbetssätt i organisationer.
* Erfarenhet av UX writing eller arbete med tonalitet, språk och begriplighet i digitala tjänster.
* Erfarenhet av arbete i stora organisationer eller verksamheter med komplex struktur och många beroenden.

**Sista ansökningsdag:** 2026-01-23


Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.


Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.

title: Area Director - Meta Area
description:
***If you’re looking to make the best co-op games in the world, you’ve come to the right place. We're proud to have some of the best game makers and collaborators in the industry working with us. What's more, we're a fun bunch of game developers, who love to indulge in our passion for video games together. Our games are not for everyone. Are they for you?***

**We are now looking for an Area Director**
-------------------------------------------


The Meta Area focuses on the systems that frame, support, and deepen the player experience. This includes progression, systems design, narrative structures, UI and UX, and other meta layers that shape long term engagement and player value across the game.


As an Area Director, you will lead cross discipline work across multiple feature teams. You will work closely with an Area Producer and the Team Owners within your Area, providing high level vision, direction, and goals while ensuring teams are set up to deliver their best work.


This role is suited for someone with strong experience as a Senior or Expert in Game Design, Systems Design, Narrative Design, and or UI or UX design. Experience with monetization, backend systems, or board or roleplaying game design is a strong bonus.

**What you'll do:**

* Uphold the vision for the Meta Area by providing a clear and widely understood road ahead. Inspire teams with vision, strategy, and long term goals that align with the overall game direction.
* Guide the creative direction across the Area for both live updates and mid term arcs, ensuring features are engaging, meaningful, and aligned with Arrowhead’s way of making games.
* Provide direction through briefs, goals, targets, and continuous follow up, ensuring execution stays aligned with vision, player value, and product goals.
* Approve deliverables within the Area, ensuring acceptable quality, vision alignment, and player experience standards across all facets of development.
* Continuously assess player value against cost and risk, driving informed decisions that strengthen gameplay, engagement, and long term sustainability.
* Represent the Area towards the Product Team and stakeholders, advocating for the developers’ work, initiatives, and creative capital.
* Collaborate closely with Team Owners and the Area Producer to establish goals, map capacity, manage dependencies, and ensure teams are structured to take responsibility for their work.
* Set priorities and articulate clear product bets that balance vision, player impact, delivery cost, and data insights.
* Maintain visibility of Area performance through measurable goals and data literacy, contributing to the Product Team’s KPI tracking and shared understanding of progress.
* Build trust and foster a high performing Area by encouraging open communication, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
* Hold an overview of Area capacity, ensuring scope matches available functions and that dependencies are clearly mapped and managed.
* Work with managers and producers to support hiring needs, performance feedback, and long term growth requirements for the Area.
* Contribute as an active member of the Product Team, alongside the Game Director, Product Director, and Head of Production, helping shape the broader roadmap and long term development of the game.

**What we're looking for:**

* Extensive experience within your discipline, with a strong track record of shipped titles and high quality work.
* A broad game development competence profile, with strong understanding of systems, player motivation, and long term engagement.
* Experience leading or guiding teams, with the ability to provide direction without needing to be the authoritative expert in every part of the work.
* Strong communication skills, able to align teams, stakeholders, and the wider studio around a shared vision.
* Strategic and structured thinking, balancing creative insight with practical delivery focus.
* A collaborative mindset and passion for building motivated, autonomous, and high performing team

**Bonus**

* Experience with monetization systems or live service frameworks.
* Experience working closely with backend systems.
* Experience designing complex systems inspired by board games or roleplaying games.
* Familiarity with cross discipline collaboration in large scale projects.

##### **How to apply**


If you think that this position matches your background and skills, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your CV in English as soon as possible. We ask that your application always include relevant work samples or a link to your portfolio.


We interview candidates continuously and hire when we find a good fit.  

  



##### **Practical Information**

**Scope:** Full-time: 40 hours per week with initial 6 month probation period.  

**Location:** Office first, hybrid solution possible. You need to be eligble to work in Sweden.

 **We are a pet friendly office! You can expect to find dogs and occasionally some cats around.**

##### **What we offer**


Arrowhead Game Studios is a growing team of about 100+ people, best known for our co-op titles. Despite our size, we remain a friendly and down to earth bunch, who love to indulge in our passion for video games together.


Located for now, in an office on the Hammarby Kaj waterfront, we enjoy everything Stockholm has to offer. A thriving game dev scene, along with all types of activities are immediately available on our doorstep.


Our talented developers are crucial to our success, therefore we put a lot of emphasis in creating and maintaining a prosperous culture. We’re committed to open and transparent communication. Your ideas are welcomed, valued, appreciated - the ceiling for creative discussions is high.


We also have numerous work benefits for all our employees. You can read about them here!
company_description: Arrowhead Game Studios is a mid-sized game developer located in Stockholm, Sweden. We have released four games to date for PlayStation & PC.

title: UX Lead
description:
At Billogram, we like to be the good guys of billing, making money when clients are happy and pay on time rather than from missed payments. We believe it always pays off to treat people well. That’s why our platform for invoices and payments is built to remove pain and instead be of gain to both our clients and their customers – improving their relations.


To ensure continuous growth and become a leader in the European consumer billing market, we are now looking for a UX Lead to join our team.

#### **About the role:**


As UX Lead at Billogram, you will be the key driver in defining and developing our entire UX capability. Your mission is to move beyond executing design requests to becoming a strategic partner who ensures user insights and data directly drive our product roadmap.


This is a high-impact role where you take full ownership of the UX vision at Billogram. You will be the driving force behind all UX design, simultaneously setting the strategy, principles, and key metrics and being hands-on to deliver immediate value to the Product Teams. Working closely with Product Managers and developers, you will ensure a cohesive, high-quality experience across the entire customer journey.

#### **Primary Responsibilities:**

* **Own & Define UX Strategy:** Define Billogram’s UX Design principles and strategy, establish key metrics for UX impact, and set the ways of working to fully integrate UX into the product development lifecycle.
* **Drive End-to-End Execution:** Lead the full design process from discovery to delivery. This includes hands-on work in user research, data analysis, high-fidelity prototyping (UI), and writing in-product copy.
* **Improvement & Innovation:** Actively seek opportunities to improve and change processes, leverage new technologies like AI to enhance ways of working, and ensure the function is constantly learning and evolving.
* **Stakeholder & Change Advocacy:** Build strong relationships and actively champion the UX vision, communicating insights to Product Managers, developers, and other stakeholders to foster organizational alignment.
* **Elevate Product Experience:** Act as the key player in rolling out important product functionality and ensuring a cohesive, delightful experience across all customer journeys.
* **Systems & Automation:** Develop the strategy for our design system and internal automation to ensure a highly efficient workflow. This includes optimizing how we build flows and automating processes for in-product copy and translations, ensuring a cohesive and high-quality experience.

#### **What we are looking for:**


You are a pragmatic, positive, and naturally curious individual who takes full responsibility for your work. You have no prestige when it comes to hands-on work and are motivated by problem-solving. You are deeply customer-focused, constantly striving to achieve that delightful "wow" experience for our users. You are also confident but remain humble, enabling you to effectively manage stakeholders and drive successful collaboration across the organization. Finally, you have strong communication skills which you leverage to champion the UX vision and effectively drive organizational alignment.

#### **What will help you succeed:**

* Several years of practical experience across the full UX spectrum: research, user testing, high-fidelity prototyping (UI), and writing.
* A strong, hands-on ability to build advanced, interactive prototypes using code or technical frameworks to test and validate experiences, while mastering modern design tools (for example Figma).
* Proven experience leveraging AI/ML technologies not only in the product design itself, but also to significantly enhance your own design workflow and processes.
* Proven ability to define a UX Design Strategy and establish KPIs to measure the business impact of UX work.
* Proven experience in driving organizational or process change is beneficial.
* Experience from the Fintech sector or working with complex payment/billing products is a plus.
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken, is required. Fluency in Swedish is a plus.

#### **What we offer:**


At Billogram we promise you an exciting journey as we break into new markets and grow at a rapid pace. That aside you will get lots of freedom and opportunity to develop together with great colleagues at our office, right in the center of Stockholm. We also offer flexible working hours, exciting challenges and a whole lot of laughs.


We're committed to your long-term development, offering clear career progression paths. You'll also enjoy a fantastic benefits package, including 30 (+2) days of holiday, an occupational pension, a flexible wellness allowance, sick leave top-up, and parental leave compensation. At Billogram, our inclusive and diverse culture ensures that everyone can enjoy a fulfilling career and a great work-life balance.

*At Billogram, we provide equal opportunities and strive for an inclusive and diverse environment. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to gender, transgender identity or expression, ethnicity, religion or other beliefs, disability, sexual orientation, or age.*

**If you have a portfolio, please upload it under "Additional files" or simply include a link in your CV. We’re excited to see what you’ve been working on!**

title: Product Designer
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments technology, facilitating transactions between consumers, merchants, financial institutions and government entities across more than 200 countries and territories, dedicated to uplifting everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 At Visa, you'll have the opportunity to create impact at scale — tackling meaningful challenges, growing your skills and seeing your contributions impact lives around the world. Join Visa and do work that matters — to you, to your community, and to the world.
   

  





 Progress starts with you.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 Tink was founded in 2012, with the aim of changing the banking industry for the better. Tink has built Europe’s most robust Open Banking Platform – with the broadest, deepest connectivity and powerful services that create value out of financial data. Tink became part of Visa in 2022. Visa is a world leader in digital payments, facilitating transactions between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities across more than 200 countries and territories. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses and economies to thrive.
   

  





 We are seeking a skilled and experienced Product Designer to join the Visa Open Banking team.
   

  





 The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in creating best-in-class user interfaces and experiences, ensuring that users enjoy a seamless and engaging journey throughout the entire product flow. This role demands a keen eye for detail, creativity, and a deep understanding of user-centered design principles to consistently deliver exceptional and intuitive user experiences.
   

  





 Key Responsibilities:
   

  




* Deliver exceptional user experiences through thoughtful initial design and continuous iteration.
* Design from concept to implementation, considering usability, accessibility, localization, scalability, and — where relevant — crafting clear, concise interface copy that’s in line with UX writing best practices.
* Conduct user research studies to gather qualitative and quantitative data (usability testing, user interviews, A/B testing, etc) to understand customer needs, validate design decisions, and refine user experience.
* Collaborate effectively with diverse teams, ensuring smooth communication and high-quality design execution.
* Own your work across the entire lifecycle, from initial ideas to design, review, build, and ongoing refinement after release.
* Ensure all deliverables align with requirements and the established design system.
* Engage in constructive design critique with designers and cross-disciplinary partners.



 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in the office will be confirmed by your Hiring Manager.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**
* 5+ years of experience in end-to-end product design for mobile and web platforms, with a portfolio demonstrating your design process, decision-making, and final outcomes.
* Bachelor's or master's degree in human–Computer Interaction, Interaction Design, User Experience, or related field
* Proven experience working in with cross-functional product teams
* Experience with design systems and technical implementations
* Ability to clearly present and explain design decisions to both technical and non-technical audiences
* Good prototyping skills with a focus on clear and effective visual communication
* Have proven craftmanship in UX, UI, and user-centered design principles
* Proficiency in industry-standard design tools, particularly Figma
* Solid experience in user research and usability testing
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills
* Experience in the payments or financial services industry is a plus
* Experience of using AI in your design process is a plus
* Advanced proficiency in English


**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: Junior Digital kommunikatör – UX & innehåll
description:
Vår kund är ett bolag i stark tillväxt med en tydlig digital ambition. Nu söker de en digital kommunikatör som kombinerar starkt innehåll med ett tydligt UX-fokus för att guida användaren hela vägen.
   

  

 Rollen är operativ och passar dig med 1–3 års erfarenhet som vill arbeta nära affär och användare i en organisation med korta beslutsvägar. Här är förståelse för struktur, flöden och UX lika viktigt som att skriva bra texter.
   

  

**Dina uppgifter**
* Skriva webbtexter, artiklar och innehåll med fokus på tydlighet och UX-writing
* Strukturera innehåll och flöden så att användaren enkelt hittar rätt
* Säkerställa en konsekvent tonalitet och digital identitet i alla kanaler
* Skapa och vidareutveckla nyhetsbrev och kampanjutskick
* Planera och publicera innehåll i sociala medier


**Vi tror att du**
* Har 1–3 års erfarenhet som kommunikatör, skribent eller i en liknande roll
* Har ett intresse för användarupplevelse och förstår hur språk och struktur påverkar digital kommunikation
* Är en trygg skribent som kan anpassa ton och nivå efter målgrupp
* Är självgående, nyfiken och trivs i en föränderlig miljö


**Vad erbjuds?**
 Du erbjuds en viktig roll i ett bolag i tillväxt i Stockholm, där du får förtroende att ta ansvar och utvecklas i takt med verksamheten. Här råder en prestigelös kultur med högt tempo och snabba beslut.
   

  

*Detta är en direktrekrytering som hanteras av Liminity AB. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande.*

title: Marketing Web & Content creator
description:
**About Mynt** 




 Mynt is an all-in-one corporate card and spend management platform on a mission to reinvent business banking. By combining smart software with cards and payments infrastructure, we remove manual, time-consuming admin from how companies manage spending.
 



  





 We’re growing fast across the Nordics and have secured significant funding to support our continued expansion in Sweden and internationally.
 



  





 Mynt is a tech-first, product-driven company where teams are empowered to solve real problems and build things that matter. We’re a licensed e-money institution, card issuer, and payment processor, operating under the supervision of the Swedish Financial Supervisory Authority. Through strong partnerships with leading players such as Fortnox and Nordea — and many more on the way — our solutions are now live across all Nordic countries.
 



  





 Joining Mynt means helping shape both a category-defining product and a company that’s still early in its journey. With 90+ colleagues (and growing), we’re building teams that value ownership, momentum, and customer impact.
 



  





**About the role & team** 




 We’re looking for a
 **Web & Content Creator** 
 to join our growing marketing team. As Mynt scales, you’ll play a central role in evolving our brand, digital presence, and visual communication across channels. This is a hands-on role with real ownership, ideal for someone who enjoys combining design, development, and execution.
 



  





 In Marketing at Mynt, we care deeply about getting things done. We believe in autonomy, trust, and learning by doing. We’re a small, high-performing team working closely with the business and sales objectives. You’ll have room to experiment, grow your skill set, and see the direct impact of your work.
 



  





**What you’ll spend your days doing** 




**Build** 



* Highly responsive, modern websites for Mynt’s brands.



  





**Create** 



* Compelling visual communication and advertising — both static and moving — across digital and print.



  





**Optimize** 



* Our websites and visual brand for target audiences, SEO, and LLM-based search.



  





**Design & develop** 



* Engaging content and experiences for both virtual and physical events.



  





**Who you are** 



* 1–3+ years of experience in a similar role, ideally in a fast-moving scale-up
* A bachelor’s degree in marketing, communications, design, or a related field
* A strong business mindset and an understanding of how design and web drive growth
* Proven experience working in Webflow
* Experience with tools such as After Effects, Premiere Pro, or similar
* A track record of creating effective, high-quality visual communication
* Strong skills in Figma



  





**Extra bonus points if you…** 



* Have a solid portfolio showcasing modern animation, and interaction design
* Experience with frontend development
* Experience collaborating with cross-functional teams
* Hands-on experience producing video



  





 At Mynt, we create lasting impact through innovation and technology. You’ll be part of an ambitious journey, with the opportunity to shape how a fast-growing fintech brand looks, feels, and performs, and to see your work make a real difference.
 



  





**Why you’ll love it here** 



* Be part of an amazing team in a fast-growing scale-up.
* Work closely with a fun, high-performing team.
* Enjoy a flexible working environment with a great office location in central Stockholm.
* Shape your own development and responsibilities based on your passion and interest.



  





*The position will be filled as soon as we find a suitable candidate. Please reach out to us as soon as possible if you believe this for you! 🌟*

title: Web Producer
description:
**About Plus1**
 Plus1 is on a mission to end "ostrich economics." We help people lift their heads, take control, and get their finances back in the plus. We aren't a traditional bank – we are a financial partner. We simplify the complex, negotiate better terms, and consolidate loans to give our customers peace of mind and more money left at the end of the month.
   

  

 As a part of the 0TO9 ecosystem, Plus1 combines high-tech financial solutions with a human touch. We’ve already helped our customers save over 2 billion SEK, and as we scale into new markets, we need someone who can help us make the complex feel simple through world-class digital experiences.
   

  

**The Role**
 We are looking for a Web Producer to join our growing marketing team. This is a role for someone with a strong eye for design and a deep understanding of user experience. You will work closely with our team of three, taking full ownership of our site’s UX, design, and flow.
   

  

 You’ll be the bridge between brand and tech, ensuring that every visitor to our site has a world-class experience. We are scaling fast into new markets, so you need to be comfortable working internationally and moving at startup speed.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Own and develop the website experience with a focus on UX and visual impact
* You will work in Webflow, a no-code web platform.
* Work with a Brand Design Toolbox in Figma and Canva.
* Manage and update content across multiple markets to support our international expansion.
* Continuously optimize the site for conversion and user engagement.
* Collaborate daily with the marketing team to align web updates with global campaigns.
* Stay ahead of the curve by implementing AI-driven tools and innovative web solutions.


**Who You Are**
 We are in a fast-moving scaleup phase that requires you to be a brave self-starter who isn't afraid to challenge the status quo. You are AI-driven, always looking for new ways to work smarter, and you keep a sharp eye on the latest digital trends.
   

  

* Minimum of 3-4 years of experience in a similar role
* Proficient in Webflow (or similar), Figma and Canva with a strong eye for design
* Experienced in startup or scale-up environments where you’ve handled international launches
* Independent and proactive, you bring proposals to the table before we even ask
* A positive "people person" who thrives in a high-ceiling team culture
* Fluent in both Swedish and English


**What We Offer**
 You’ll be joining us at the most exciting time possible. As a key player in a fast-growing fintech, your energy and ideas won't just be heard, they’ll actually change how we work. We believe in giving talented people the space to grow, meaning there are massive opportunities to take on more responsibility as Plus1 continues to expand into new markets.
   

  

 You will be based in our stunning headquarters in the heart of Stockholm, proudly nominated as Sweden’s Most Beautiful Office 2025. Most importantly, you’ll join a team that truly loves what they do, values bold innovation, and keeps the ceiling high.

title: Grafisk formgivare
description:
**Grafisk formgivare** 

  





 Vi är en liten, personlig byrå som arbetar nära våra kunder och varandra. Hos oss får du en varierad roll där du är delaktig i den kreativa processen, från idé och koncept till färdig produktion. Som grafisk formgivare arbetar du med visuell kommunikation för både tryckta och digitala kanaler och är med och formar samt utvecklar våra kunders visuella uttryck.
 



 Rollen kombinerar kreativ formgivning med förståelse för varumärke, målgrupp och användarupplevelse. Du ansvarar för att ta fram genomtänkta visuella lösningar som är konsekventa och anpassade för olika sammanhang.
 



  





 En viktig del av rollen är att arbeta med rörligt material och fotografering, vilket innebär att detta är ett krav för tjänsten.
 



  





**I rollen ingår bland annat att:** 



* Producera grafiskt material för print såsom annonser, affischer, flyers och broschyrer
* Skapa digitala annonser för webb, sociala medier och kampanjer
* Ta fram och anpassa rörligt material i form av animationer, videoannonser och innehåll för sociala medier
* Fotografera vid behov, inklusive enklare porträtt, miljöbilder och
 
 produktfotografering
 
 för kampanjer och digitala kanaler
* Säkerställa att allt material följer och stärker kunders visuella identitet
* Arbeta med UX-design för webb och digitala gränssnitt, inklusive struktur, layout och flöden
* Ta fram enklare prototyper och visuell design med fokus på användarvänlighet och tillgänglighet
* Samarbeta tätt med teamet och bidra med idéer, koncept och visuella lösningar i tidiga skeden



  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Relevant utbildning inom grafisk design, visuell kommunikation eller motsvarande erfarenhet
* Goda kunskaper i Adobe Creative Cloud (InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop – 
 **After Effects och/eller Premiere Pro är ett krav** 
 )
* Erfarenhet av produktion för både print och digitala kanaler
* **Dokumenterad erfarenhet av rörligt innehåll** 
  och anpassning för olika format och plattformar
* **Erfarenhet av fotografering** 
 , inklusive produktfotografering
* Grundläggande till god kompetens inom UX-design
* Erfarenhet av verktyg som Figma, Sketch eller liknande
* Stark känsla för typografi, färg, form och detaljer



  





**För att trivas i rollen ser vi att du:** 



* Är kreativ, strukturerad och noggrann
* Har förmåga att arbeta självständigt och ta ansvar för dina leveranser
* Är lösningsorienterad och van vid att hantera flera projekt parallellt
* Har ett gott öga för helhet och detaljer
* Är nyfiken, prestigelös och trivs i samarbete med andra



  





**Vi erbjuder** 



* En varierad roll med stort kreativt utrymme
* Möjlighet att arbeta med både form, innehåll, rörligt material och fotografering
* Ett engagerat team och ett öppet, prestigelöst arbetsklimat
* Möjlighet att påverka och utveckla det visuella uttrycket över tid



  





**Omfattning:** 
 50%
 



**Ort:** 
 Stockholm (på plats)
 



  





 Skicka din ansökan och portfolio till hej@unitedinsights.se
 



 Vi arbetar med löpande urval och rekommenderar att du skickar in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. 
 



  





 Vi ser fram emot att höra ifrån dig!

title: UX Research Operations Specialist
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Flerårig erfarenhet av UX research, gärna med fokus på ResearchOps
* Mycket god kunskap om verktyg och processer för att samla, dokumentera och dela data och insikter
* Erfarenhet av att införa och driva researchprocesser i större organisationer
* God förståelse för hur olika researchmetoder kompletterar varandra
* Vana vid relevanta AI-verktyg för hela researchprocessen
* Utmärkt samarbets- och kommunikationsförmåga (på svenska)


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 22-01-2026
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Senior UX Designer
description:
**Craft:**
 UX & UI
   

  

**Job Description:**
****Job Description:****
**Candy Crush Candy Saga is looking for a Senior UX Designer to bring their passion for games and design to craft delightful player experiences for our players worldwide.**
****Your role within the Kingdom****
**Your role is to craft experiences that keep, engage, and delight our global Candy Crush Saga audience.**
**The role requires someone versatile and willing to take on diverse creative challenges to help us build meta systems and features for Candy Crush Saga, played by millions worldwide. Across all stages of the design process, you will work closely with other designers, engineers, researchers, and business stakeholders to uncover new opportunities, execute compelling design ideations, and develop end-to-end solutions that bring simplicity, intuition, and delight to complex and social systems.**
****Your responsibilities will include****
* Drive the UX design of core meta game systems and key game features, ensuring alignment with the game's creative vision, player needs, and business goals.
* Ensure creative excellence through wireframes, flows, copywriting, low-fi, and hi-fi mockups, and animated, interactive prototypes.
* Collaborate with other UX peers to strike a cohesive overall meta experience.
* Work closely with Game Designers, UI designers, Artists, and Developers to deliver design solutions for identified problem/opportunity spaces.
* Analyse competitor games to gather insights and work closely with UX Researchers, Analysts, and Product Managers to ensure hypotheses are properly validated and that data and player insights are turned into meaningful experiences.
* Explore new opportunities and practices, AI tooling, and UX theories to enhance our methodological toolkits.


****Skills to create the thrills****
* Proficiency and years of demonstrated success in UX design for free-to-play mobile games.
* Excellent communicator, possessing strong oral, written, and social skills to execute copywriting tasks and express the rationale behind design decisions.
* Experience in UX strategy and design thinking, with validated expertise in designing features and core systems for games.
* Knowledge of technical constraints, optimisation, and implementation.
* Expertise in the prototyping tool Figma and knowledge of and interest in copywriting, emerging AI tools (e.g., Figma Make), and freemium best practices.
* Highly creative, with a knack for developing standout ideas that bring the “wow” to our players.
* Experience working in an agile environment and the ability to change things on the fly.


****About King****
 King is a leading interactive entertainment company for the mobile world, with people all around the world playing one or more of our games, including franchises such as Candy Crush, Farm Heroes, Pet Rescue and Bubble Witch.
   

  

 We have 249 million monthly active users as of fourth quarter 2019 across web, social and mobile platforms. King was acquired by Activision Blizzard Inc. (Nasdaq ATVI) in February 2016 and operates as an independent unit of the company.
   

  

**A Great Saga Needs All Sorts of Heroes**
 Making games is fun. Especially when you do it with people who share the same idea of what makes a good workplace great. We design games for everyone, no matter where they are or who they are, and we employ all sorts of people from all kinds of backgrounds to bring them to life. Truth is, we simply cannot expect diversity in our players and originality in our games without first nurturing it in our people. A great saga needs all sorts of heroes.
   

  

**Making the World Playful**
 Making the World Playful is what inspires us to create new experiences and raise the bar. It’s what makes King a place where we can all dream bigger, continue to add innovation to our games, broadening the portfolio and exploring new territories in mid- core and casual. We take the art and science of gaming to the next level through our curiosity for the unexplored, passion for games, respect for each other and love for our players - and we’re not afraid to have fun along the way. In fact, together with our parent company Activision Blizzard and experts around the world, we believe having fun is good for you.
   

  

 There has never been a better time to join us. We're dreaming bigger and see a world of possibilities ahead. If you share our passion, our values, and our hunger to shape the future, join us in Making the World Playful!
   

  

****About King****
 With a mission of
 *Making the World Playful* 
 , King is a leading interactive entertainment company with more than 20 years of history of delivering some of the world’s most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry, including the world-famous Candy Crush franchise, as well as other mobile game hits such as
 *Farm Heroes Sag* 
 a. King games are played by more than 200 million monthly active users. King, part of Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT), has Kingsters in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona, Berlin, Dublin, San Francisco, New York, Los Angeles and Malta. More information can be found at King.com or by following us on LinkedIn, @lifeatking on Instagram, or @king\_games on X.

title: Business Analyst within eHealth
description:
*Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in eHealth with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our eHealth solutions supports health care professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish healthcare. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.*
**The position**
 We are looking for a Business Analyst who will work in our R&D EHR Care team. In our team, we work with exciting initiatives where we enable information to be available at the right place in the right time, e.g. through various integrations. The products enable, for example, patients to be able to read their medical records or book appointments online. It also enables healthcare professionals to read and use information from external specialist system in the system used at emergency wards or inpatient care.
   

  

 As a Business Analyst, you will be a part of an agile development team including developers and testers. You will also collaborate closely with product owner(s), other business analysts, informaticians and architects. You will investigate and analyze needs, detail requirements, and design integration solutions for both new and existing products. You are an important link between the developers and the customer, with the mission to understand the needs of our end users and translate them into technical solutions. You often get to follow an initiative all the way from pre-study to development and implementation at the customer's premises. As part of our team, you will do meaningful work where you help to improve and digitize healthcare processes.
   

  

**We Offer**
* A strong team spirit where you will have plenty of interactions and ceremonies with your team, both at the office as well as online
* Be part of driving Swedish eHealth forward by helping design solutions and standards used across Sweden and internationally.
* Possibility to join different interest groups and guilds where you can dive into your passions and grow both personally and professionally.
* You will connect with an international network and work closely with colleagues in Sweden and Sri Lanka.


**About You**
 You work independently and with your own drive but also thrive when you get the opportunity to collaborate with your teammates, other Business Analysts, as well as other roles across the organization. In this role, you will explore how AI can enhance requirements management, product design, and data analysis. You like to meet our customers, partners and eHealth organizations and are passionate about finding the best solutions. We believe that you are analytical, well-structured and with strong cooperation skills.
   

  

**Requirements** 

* Experience in business analysis, requirement analysis, product design or similar.
* Great knowledge in how business needs can be translated into software requirements.
* Great ability to collaborate with product owner(s), architects, system developers and UX designers.
* Communicates fluently in English in speech and writing.


**It's a bonus if you**
* Experience of health informatics, and/or integration work (e.g. API design).
* Experience in Swedish or other European national eHealth solutions
* Knowledge of healthcare standards and specifications (FHIR, HL7v2, RIVTA, OpenEHR, SNOMED CT)
* Previously have worked within healthcare
* Highly meritorious with experience of COSMIC and related integration solutions


**Additional information:** 
 We will start the selection process after the holidays.
   

  

**Place of employment** 
 : Stockholm or Linköping
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full-time, hybrid work model (three days per week in-office)
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

 We review applications and conduct interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
**CAMBIO- FOR A HEALTHIER TOMORROW**
 Welcome to a company where healthcare is improved every day. Here you will work with leading technology in a collaborative, trusting and empowering environment where your contribution will be appreciated and celebrated. In our caring culture you will have the opportunity to pursue different paths of professional growth. Seize the opportunity to do the most important work of your life
 **.** 
 Read more about us
 **here!**
**A healthier tomorrow also means taking care of those who make it possible -** 
 explore our employee benefits
   

  

 Learn more about our recruitment process here.
   

  

 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at our career site.
   

  

 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

Our e-health solutions supports health care professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish healthcare.  As a Business Analyst, you will be a part of one or several agile development teams including developers and testers. You will also collaborate closely with product owner(s), other business analysts, informaticians, architects and UX designers. You will investigate and analyze needs, detail requirements, and design solutions for one of Sweden’s leading healthcare journal systems.
